page.title: 11HOME LIFE IN LAUGHARNE
page.content: When husband is at work, older children at school, mother at home washes, usually by machine, irons, cooks by solid fuel, electricity or bottled gas, and does the other housework. She can visit the Health Clinic, Mother & Toddler Group, Pre- school Playgroup or the Children's Playing Field. All her provisions are available in Laugharne but shops further afield for clothing, footwear, furnishing and hardware. At night people relax in front of TV, do their own DIY decorating, visit local pubs, walk or garden. People still feel safe in Laugharne. Many people have dogs or cats or a caged bird. Visiting relatives/friends locally or in hospital etc. is a popular pastime. Divorce rates seem lower than the national average.
